original_text:
“Bless God in the great congregation,
    the Lord, O you who are of Israel's fountain!”
korean_text: 이스라엘의 근원에서 나온 너희여 대회 중에 하나님 곧 주를 송축할지어다

sentences.original_text: Bless God in the great congregation, the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 회중 가운데서 하나님, 주님을 송축하라,

sentences.original_text: O you who are of Israel's fountain!
